parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Force opens curator interface.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''openCuratorInterface'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Open interface: <code>[[openCuratorInterface]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Close interface: <code>[[findDisplay]] 312 [[closeDisplay]] 2;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Detect if user used "Zeus" key to open curator interface in the absence of event handler for it: <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", {
	if ([[inputAction]] "CuratorInterface" > 0) [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Curator interface is open";
	};
	[[false]]
}];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3: Curator]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Client side execution
</value></part></template></root>
